hero.description: More than a rental company. We are a collective of Nordschleife enthusiasts dedicated to the pursuit of the perfect lap through heritage, precision, and safety.

book.title: Book your experience
book.description: Select your date and vehicle below.

cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to improve your experience and for analytics.

fleet.title: Choose your beast
fleet.description: Our fleet is meticulously maintained by track-specialized engineers to ensure peak performance for every lap.

whyRent4Ring.heading: Why Rent4Ring?
whyRent4Ring.intro1: At Rent4Ring, we take a genuine motorsport approach to every car in our fleet. Each vehicle is upgraded and modified in-house by experts and enthusiasts to ensure top-tier performance and reliability.
whyRent4Ring.intro2: We never cut corners. Forget cheap "upgrades" or budget components—our cars are equipped with the finest racing parts available:
whyRent4Ring.closing: With Rent4Ring, you're not just renting a car, you're renting a premium motorsport experience.

brakes.label: HIGH FRICTION
brakes.title: Brakes (Endless)
brakes.description: We buy Endless racing pads for superior stopping power. Unmatched heat resistance and consistent bite for lap-after-lap precision.

suspension.label: PRECISION TUNING
suspension.title: Suspension (Öhlins)
suspension.description: Custom engineered Öhlins DFV or TTX setups for precision handling, engineered alongside Nürburgring suspension experts 4RUO.

tires.label: MECHANICAL GRIP
tires.title: Tires (Michelin / Yokohama)
tires.description: We prefer premium brands; most of our cars run Michelin and Yokohama track tires for maximum grip in every weather condition.

safety.label: TOTAL PROTECTION
safety.title: Safety (Wiechers / Recaro)
safety.description: Full German-made Wiechers roll cages, Recaro seats, and Schroth 4-point harnesses for ultimate driver safety.
